ModMetadata.Name: SEGI - Sonic Ether Globall Illumination
ModMetadata.Author: Erdroy
ModMetadata.Description:
WARNING: This mod will not work, unless you install Stationeers.Addon mod loader. Read how to install it here: https://github.com/Erdroy/Stationeers.Addons ---
Work in progress. Currently not working and missing some code. This mod adds experimental fully-dynamic voxel-based global illumination to the game. This is pretty heavy and not ready to use. It is more likely just an experiment with our Stationers.Addons framework.
